header.title: Office free of charge for our students | SÃ¡mi University of Applied Sciences

body.p: Office free of charge for our students
For students free of charge The students at SUC get the Office package for free. Both for Windows and Mac, at this page: http://samas.onthehub.com
Discount for employees SUC employees get the same Office package to lower price. Costs only 6.75 Euro.
Upgrade possibilities If you already got Office licence, it is possible to upgrade your Office pack.
Students: First of all you need a login-user to get to the page http://samas.onthehub.com . To get one you send your name, e-mail and student number to lemetih@samiskhs.no .
Employees: Send your name and your work e-mail to Lemet Ivar.
